Using a Bayesian regression model, and  the  formula totalâˆ¼gold+silver+bronze

```{r}

#| label: setup
#| message: FALSE 
#| echo: FALSE 


library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

data <- read.csv("Olympic_Games_Medal_Tally.csv") 

model <- brm(
  total ~ gold + silver + bronze,
  data = data,
  family = gaussian(),  
  prior = c(
    set_prior("normal(0, 10)", class = "b"),  
    set_prior("cauchy(0, 2)", class = "Intercept"), 
    set_prior("cauchy(0, 2)", class = "sigma")  
  ),
  chains = 4,  
  iter = 2000, 
  warmup = 1000,  
  cores = 2
)

summary(model)

plot(model)

pp_check(model)
```
